website_summaries.verdict: There's fun to be had with Dying Light, but it's not going to breathe new life into a genre that's essentially on life support.
pros: Dying Light is a great-looking first-person-shooter zombie shooter that features an impressively smooth parkour traversal system
cons: At the end of the day Dying Light is just another zombie game that doesn't do much to separate itself from the pack
Also, it's story is severely lacking

customer_reviews.title: Epic First-Person Zombie Butt Woopin'
customer_reviews.text: This is a mix between Far Cry and zombie awesomeness in it's most pure form. This game is both amazing from the graphics, game play, and story; to the ultra-creepiness when the sun goes down on the town. The town is graphically stunning in the day light hours, but once the sun dips below the horizon, there is absolutely no light besides your little flashlight. I enjoy the slower-passed Fallout and Skyrim-type games, and I love the way Far Cry plays in first person. Dying light is all of that, with zombies and exceptional graphics. This is a must for any gamer.
customer_reviews.author: Kbooze

customer_reviews.title: Dying light? More like Don't touch the lava!
customer_reviews.text: Great game, definitely something new to the zombie craz. The only issue.. the campaign was really short, but I know they plan on realizing DLC to add onto the story ( At least I would hope! ) The game is fun, and at times challenging and scary! The game really does change one the sun goes down! While running try holding down Y, or Triangle this feature is great fun while running from the night runners at night! Brings a new whole feeling when you are actually able to look back at your attackers but at the same time not knowing where you are heading! The suspense and terror!
customer_reviews.author: TigerBlood6

customer_reviews.title: If you played Dead Island you'll love this. Open world zombies
customer_reviews.text: If you played Dead Island you'll love this. Open world zombies, craft, scavenge, kill, SURVIVE! Things they added are quite a few things. I'll mention 2 of the main ones. Night and verticality. Night time is when it gets bad. There are stronger more resilient zombies lurking at night. Verticality impliments the ability to climb more thus creating good places for loot. I have to say these two things scared me about this game but I actually like it. They always say fear change and I'm one. So yeah grab this game without a doubt if you like zombie games. I made sure not to spoil anything by my descriptions. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: jbay

customer_reviews.title: We loved Dead Island 1 and 2 and many other zombie ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a game that flew under the radar for our family. We loved Dead Island 1 and 2 and many other zombie games. So we were all shocked we had not heard of this game sooner after playing it for our first time. Fast paced, fun multiplayer or solo with non stop intense action. This game will make you jump while playing more than you care to admit. Definitely worth the buy if you are into fast pace, objective oriented character leveling zombie games.
customer_reviews.author: Hectic Mom

customer_reviews.title: Unique
customer_reviews.text: This is a very unique game. The free - running is very cool in an open world zombie game. The story is great and that's another reason why I like it. The graphics are way better than I had imagined. The hour I had to wait to install it was worth it. The main menu music and how it was set up was very neat. I like the upgrading of the weapons and the different types of Enemies. Don't go out at night, for the first few days I had the game, I had believed that it had been night already and it wasn't that bad. Haha. Then it happened and I was screaming in terror. You'll see. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: HUDSONTW

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Being a fan of the original Dead Island - I was interested to see where Techland would go after parting ways with Deep Silver. Dying Light is not a clone of their previous work but a full expansion into new territory. The landscape is impressive, combat entertaining and the story (side missions included) interesting enough to keep your attention. While I would not call Dying Light a Dead Island clone - it does bring over some familiar aspects; weapon crafting, heavy melee combat, skill trees and overall gorgeous design. I highly recommend the game to fans of Dead Island and those just getting interested.
customer_reviews.author: Trent C. Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: great concept, but got boring quick
customer_reviews.text: Really frustrated with this game. It has such potential but just wasted. Really enjoyed it at first, then quickly got boring. Story is aweful, quest even worse and super repetitive. They had such a good idea with the free running set up and crafting, but really feels like they just threw it together quickly. I made it to 70% story complete and quit playing for no other reason than I felt there is absolutely nothing keeping me interested. I felt that way at about 40% but pushed to 70. I definitely would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: THUMPER

customer_reviews.title: ONE OF MY FAVORITES
customer_reviews.text: This game is pretty old now but the replay value is amazing if you love parkour and zombies and an amazing story line this game is it! also the DLC is even better!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Bloody Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is what I have been waiting for since before I knew what I was waiting for. Zombies of every type... quick, slow, smart, stupid, strong, weak, specials, basics.... absolute Zombie heaven for this fan. I wish I could customize my character appearance but beyond that this game has met all my expectations of what it would be like to play. Open world, free running is awesome and I now wish this was possible in games like Fallout and Skyrim.
customer_reviews.author: CHASE A ROMAN

customer_reviews.title: One of the best games I've ever played.
customer_reviews.text: This game is truly keeping what it promises, it is exciting to play for hour on end, and the thrill when 2100 hours hits and night falls is second to non. I like it so much for that I'm giving it 9.5 out of 10, the free running, the parkour system, the climbing where you want when you want, all things which I want to see in a next gen game. You want a thrill for days, go for this game, it wil thrill you, in every which way you can think of. especially when you climb on one of those super tall structures, it does feel you are climbing it yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Volker Brunke

customer_reviews.title: Great game with 4 player co-op....
customer_reviews.text: This game is awesome and deserves more love than it has received. For one, it controls great for a game that is based mostly on parkouring your way around a vast city while simultaneously stopping and slicing/bashing/shooting the heck of our zombified citizens. Vaulting up to a building, zip lining across a chasm and then grapple hooking your way up to a bridge is oh so satisfying and fun. It also has 4 player co-op and this just adds to the fun when four players join up and take on the hordes of zombies together. I highly recommend this game if you like first person traversal games (such as Mirror's Edge) and zombies.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is such a good game that I can't stop playing it even though ...
customer_reviews.text: I will give it five stars, but with an explanation. I am not a fan of zombies. However, it is such a good game that I can't stop playing it even though I hate zombies. If it were merely a survival game against private military contractors (so you could use more guns and fight more normally) or something this game would be the best game that I have ever played. Still, it is one of the best games I've ever played.
customer_reviews.author: M Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GAME!
customer_reviews.text: One of my absolute favorite games. Can be incredibly scary, especially for night time missions, but that's what gets the blood pumping. Story is great. Graphics are excellent. Combat is well put together and I love the crafting system. If you're an explorer / adventure kind of gamer this is the way to go for sure! There are also tons of videos online with tips on how to find hidden or obscure items.
customer_reviews.author: Led Jedi

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I've played many zombie games, and this one has easily become one of my favorites. I've been in story mode for quite some time and I'm only 42% done. There's a lot of exploring to do, and I like that you can actually dive under water to search for things. Plenty of side quests to keep you busy if you don't want to rush through. If you're a fan of Dead Island, I say buy this game. You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Vallese

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any zombie fan! Great story, awesome graphics with a nice blend of music and sound effects! A+++++
customer_reviews.text: Just an awesome game that keeps any zombie fan busy for hours and hours. If you like Resident Evil, Dead Island, Left 4 Dead or any of the Dead Rising games this should do you well! No game is perfect and this applies her as well but it will leave you satisfied and still wanting more. The graphic, music and sound effects are all top notch and compliment the story really well! No complaints from me!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J.R. (Not from Dallas)

customer_reviews.title: Addicting
customer_reviews.text: Even after being multiple years old, I still find myself coming back to this game because it's so much fun. It constantly keeps you on the edge of your seat. I love being scared and video games and this one does it for me, especially at night time in the game!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Alan Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 5 Star Thriller
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game everything you could possibly want in a zombie thriller. Night time is intense and keeps you on your toes, challenging missions and exceptional weapon crafting. A great game for those who enjoy strategy, problem solving, and good ol fashion zombie beat down. I have recommended this game to a bunch of people after they bought it the online multiplayer is awesome to battle your Budds. Ignore the poor ratings this game is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: JD5280_Reviews

customer_reviews.title: ... (be a gamer not a hater) and I absolutely LOVE this game
customer_reviews.text: I have both the PS4 version and the Xbox One version (be a gamer not a hater) and I absolutely LOVE this game. I will give a slight advantage with the PS4 version because of the PS4's controller, the on-board speaker and light-bar make the game more immersive.
customer_reviews.author: O. P. Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Solid Zombie game
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game!! I was reading a lot of the one star reviews, half of them were written by 5 yr Olds complaining of no guns in the game which is false there are lots of guns and that their weapons were constantly breaking. It was apparent they don't know how to play the game. I maxed out all my stats and have some gnarly weapons as well. I had a blast playing it and I still play it. Fantastic graphics, the game really shines on the Xbox one. If your a zombie fan this game is A MUST OWN TITLE PEROID.
customer_reviews.author: Benjo

customer_reviews.title: Zombies man...
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it's a slow moving role playing game. It's a fun contrast to the fast paced online shooter games that I play. It's fun to jump into this world occasionally. It was slow to start but has some cool mechanics you can learn along the way.
customer_reviews.author: mike c.

customer_reviews.title: the hype was amazing. and to me this game lived up to ...
customer_reviews.text: I remember when this game still wasn't released yet, the hype was amazing. and to me this game lived up to it! dead island meets assassins creed. the only way this game can be made even better....Xbox one X enhanced!
customer_reviews.author: Duffys fury

customer_reviews.title: GOTY easily imo and it would have won last year had ...
customer_reviews.text: GOTY easily imo and it would have won last year had it come out then. This game is incredible. The story is long and detailed, and doesnt seem to be slowing down. I am currently about 355% done wiith the main story, and I have easily put 25 hours in. Already bought the season pass. BUY THIS GAME!
customer_reviews.author: Noname

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Dead Island was ok. Dead Island Riptide was much better. It felt more streamlined and progression was much faster. Also the story line was greatly improved. Dying Light is sooooooooo much better. If you liked either of the above 2 then you will probably love this one.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Intense!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most intense games I have ever played. My heart pounded every time it began getting dark. The open world could be larger and the last sequence is impossible. It would also be great if the character development was more fluid, but otherwise a great game.
customer_reviews.author: Nando U

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pre-Fallout appetizer
customer_reviews.text: Great game, some really tense moments. Story is kind of boring, but it has a lot of morally uncomfortable moments that make it suspenseful and memorable ( though I wish character could make more decisions rather than having to go along with every total BS order he is given).
customer_reviews.author: Angry Bald Guy

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my 10 year old and he has no complaints. I'm not a gamer so that's the best I can say.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Pete

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular!!!
customer_reviews.text: I very much enjoy this game, so much that my game of the year vote goes to it and none other. Also I was completely surprised by it not scaring me at all because I am terrified of horror games. I also made my friend get it because it looked so great even before it came out
customer_reviews.author: casey schott

customer_reviews.title: The boys loved it. That's good enough for me.
customer_reviews.text: The boys enjoyed this game. I picked this out blindingly without knowing anything about games. They played this a lot and commented on how much they have fun playing it.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian(a)

customer_reviews.title: Best zombie game out right now
customer_reviews.text: This game is very frustrating, at least for me it was, at first, but it really turns into one of the best games I've ever played. I pre-ordered this and bought it at full price and would again, you definitely get your money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: DemonHunter58

customer_reviews.title: this game was a lot of fun, assassins creed meets left for dead
customer_reviews.text: this game was a lot of fun, assassins creed meets left for dead. too be honest they stole some things from left 4 dead but whatever, worth the buy if you like killing zombies. Hopefully they make a second one and make the game a little harder. I died more times jumping off things like an idiot than the zombies or enemies did.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Picarello

customer_reviews.title: super great condition & fun
customer_reviews.text: came in great condition and its a fun game. not really good for multiplayer though if thats what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Karah Jo

customer_reviews.title: Bada2xS
customer_reviews.text: I pre-ordered this game because parkour and zombies are not mixed that often. When they are, they suck. This game changed me forever, in a good way. It's fun, it's coop, and it's realistic. Have fun! (if you bought it)
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: Great game loved it
customer_reviews.text: Great game loved it. Only draw back is weapons, weapons degrade quickly and takes a while to get really good weapons. Still fun game.
customer_reviews.author: Mark e Rosas

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed this game thoroughly
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this game thoroughly. It does start off a bit slow. It takes some time to really "get into" it. Once you do though, it's pretty great. There are some truly spooky moments that keep you on your toes the whole time. This game reminds me in a lot of ways as a more melee focused Far Cry.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Taylor Freeze

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool zombie game (from a bystander's POV)
customer_reviews.text: bought as a gift for my fiance, he absolutely loves it. Pretty cool zombie game (from a bystander's POV), even if those creepy fast ones make me never want to watch the game!

customer_reviews.title: But very fun and challenging
customer_reviews.text: sorta hard to control with Xbox control I have. But very fun and challenging game

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoy this game
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this game. All the awesome of Assassins Creed free running mixed with a zombie apocalypse type story. Scavenge everything and make your own weapons from what you fine. Solid game.

customer_reviews.title: This game is really fun. A zombie horror survival game that has parkour
customer_reviews.text: This game is really fun. A zombie horror survival game that has parkour, intense combat, stealth mechanics, along with scanvenging and crafting. Really fun game to play alone or with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Green

customer_reviews.title: Great fun game!
customer_reviews.text: This game is so fun!!! What is better than killing zombies for hours?? It has a great storyline to the game and it does take a while to go through it
customer_reviews.author: hawtzombie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game..fun to play with friends..lots of content might want to look up the game of the year edition which will have all the DLC
customer_reviews.author: Justin Booth

customer_reviews.title: Germans really know how to write horror. Ever read ...
customer_reviews.text: Germans really know how to write horror. Ever read Little Red Riding Hood? Yeah. Go read the original. Exact same. If grandma was a zombie.
customer_reviews.author: John Joseph Janis

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Disc
customer_reviews.text: Probably not intentional, but disc was faulty and would not read. Tried 3 other discs on the same Xbox One X and they played fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Minear

customer_reviews.title: So Underrated
customer_reviews.text: This is the best co-op game of the current generation, by a large margin. At this point, just go buy The Following.

customer_reviews.title: Great game but difficult to play
customer_reviews.text: Great game but difficult to play, got stuck in training for a while but maybe that's just me. Overall great game once you get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Omnipotent Perpetual

customer_reviews.title: Extremely awesome game play and graphics are phenominal
customer_reviews.text: Extremely awesome game play and graphics are phenominal. I love the open world feel and roam... I can play this game everyday and not get bored...
customer_reviews.author: Soupman 35

customer_reviews.title: great game
customer_reviews.text: I just recently bought a Xbox one. This game has made the purchase worth it. It is challenging. It is satisfying to complete quests. It is a thrill to play. I find myself thinking about it while I'm at work. I purchased a few other games with it, sunset overdrive, call of duty, halo master chief collection. Dying light has made me forget about them entirely. Do yourself a favor and pick this game up.
customer_reviews.author: W. Travis Hood

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Game for the Zombie Fan
customer_reviews.text: this game is fairly unique, you play as Crain an agent for the GRE(Global Relief Effort) sent into a fairly unknown situation only to be faced by a ruthless warlord and hordes of mutating infected. You craft your own weapons from junk you can find in the streets and barter for better weapons. You upgrade your character's survival skills and combat abilities through experience and missions that you complete. Parkour is your ticket to staying alive as you climb walls, run across roof tops, zip line through rough urban terrain, and leap from building to building. This game is hours of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good game for being made in 2013 has really good graphics! Also you can play with up to 4 of your friends in campaign mode online.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Turnmire

customer_reviews.title: Don't play in the dark...
customer_reviews.text: This game is awesome! It's pretty starling at times too. There is also so much to do in the game. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Karebear

customer_reviews.title: OK but fell short of my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This game is basically Dead Rising with annoying parkour added. Most objectives involve climbing tall objects, and the controls for this are pretty bad, making the climbing more frustrating then fun. Another odd feature is that the game started out difficult and got progressively easier as you obtained skills that made running and combat more efficient. I think most people prefer to get eased into a game and have the difficulty increase as you progress with the story. I did play the game to the finish, and the co-op was a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: John Roads

customer_reviews.title: I love this game
customer_reviews.text: I love this game, it makes it feel like your actually in a zombie apocalypse. Especially the night game play, rushing to get to a safe house before really strong and scary zombies come out. A sense of survival. I have had this game for a year now and I am still playing it. 5 stars. If I could 10 stars
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: Its fun and worth the time
customer_reviews.text: Its a fun game. I get the impression its not going to have any replay ability with it, but overall a decent story and nice play.
customer_reviews.author: Boba Chux

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my boyfriend and he loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Best game I've ever played
customer_reviews.text: Best game I've ever played. long game with lots of action and very creative. best game I've ever played or owned. Highly recommended!!

customer_reviews.title: The Only Game
customer_reviews.text: This game blew my mind. I've played it to death since I first bought it six months ago, but I still create new ways to keep it fun. Even after spending three months with Fallout 4 I returned to Dying Light. 380 hours logged and counting. Good night. Good luck.

customer_reviews.text: Fun game, not 5 star good but worth the money. I'll be playing this for a long while.

customer_reviews.text: Game is a lot of fun, I enjoyed it. Recommended for zombie lovers, 4 stars only because it starts to get repetitive.

customer_reviews.text: One of the best games I have played in a long time. Awesome game play and excellent graphics with realistic actions.

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: I don't very often get sucked into a game so badly that I let it completely take over my days off and get absolutely nothing productive done around the house. This one has succeeded in sucking me in! If you don't have anything to do then I would certainly recommend this game. However, if you have tasks which need to be completed in the real world then stay away because this game will take over your life!

customer_reviews.title: The story is coherent for the most part and it has some fun moments. But alas
customer_reviews.text: If it wasn't for the clunky gameplay mechanics and buggy engine, this game would be thoroughly enjoyable. The story is coherent for the most part and it has some fun moments. But alas, it's 2015 now and we need to stop enabling games with graphical glitches and awkward hit detection/timing etc. I mean, wasn't this game delayed once already to "perfect" it? I beat it in 1 week then traded it in. Don't get me wrong, whoever enjoyed Dead Island will think this is a worthy successor. I was just hoping for something a little more polished. Here's hoping for Dead Island 2.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Sangregorio

customer_reviews.text: My son enjoys this game a lot and Amazon was cheaper than Game Stop by couple of bucks. Definitely worth buying and will continue to compare prices on Amazon to major video stores.

customer_reviews.title: Not much to do after story and 76 side missions, but tons of fun.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game, so much fun. Just finished the story and there is very little replay value, though, online still makes it fun. I have not tried be the zombie yet, but will soon.
customer_reviews.author: jg

customer_reviews.title: Very cool game- its been the best game for me this ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cool game- its been the best game for me this year- new price point- grab a copy today, Love the story - fast load times- Game get tougher as you go threw each challenges- Play it load , and in the DARK ...for a new experience.

customer_reviews.text: One of the must own games of the year for any platform. Totally immersive gameplay and endless replayability.

customer_reviews.title: The game is decent!
customer_reviews.text: This game was alright, the maps are good, I thought the graphics would be better, and the zombies tend to be annoying, I would recommend this game.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Shin

product_meta.title: WB Games Dying Light - Xbox One
product_meta.description: At night, the world undergoes a deadly transformation: the hunter becomes the hunted as the infected grow more aggressive and numerous, and something far more sinister awakens to stalk its prey
feature_bullets: At night, the world undergoes a deadly transformation: the hunter becomes the hunted as the infected grow more aggressive and numerous, and something far more sinister awakens to stalk its prey

Free Running Movement – Whether tracking prey or escaping predators, Dying Light lets players swiftly navigate the world by seamlessly leaping between buildings, grappling up walls and pouncing on unsuspecting enemies

Dying Light is set in a vast open world, delivering expansive and varied environments, a wide variety of enemy classes and a hopeless tale of survival where resources are scarce and the infected are not the only threat
Get up-close using a variety of light and heavy weapons including knives, bats, axes, sledgehammers and more exotic weaponry or utilize guns and other firepower to take down enemies from a distance

Why use a wrench when you can use a wrench wrapped in electrified barb wire Dying Light's sizeable crafting system enables players to create a slew of new, more potent weapons and equipment, as well as specialized ammunition
